description:
Sometimes, there isn’t any need for words. Other times, there are. And every so often, a relationship grows closer despite the teasing.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Kehai / Zoku Kehai / Mochimonokensa / Tosho Iin / Yuuhi
